column5: Lake Buchanan Lodge is a waterfront property on 8 acres of land. It includes a boat dock, fire pit, BBQ grills, Charcoal grills, gas grill, picnic tables, folding chairs for outside use, volley ball court, washer pits, horseshoe pits, playscape for kids, lots of trees for shade. We also rent canoes and kayaks for $25 a day. It's close to state parks and wineries.
